ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide

Class MemoryDBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide.MemoryDBConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBConnector

    public class MemoryDBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBConnector
    A class for simulating a DBConnector in memory.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Aleksandar Botev (ab9g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Dinosion Perez-Mavrogenis (dpm3g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Liam de Valmency (lpdv1g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Kim Svensson (ks6g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public boolean connect()
        Description copied from interface: DBConnector
        Attempts to instantiates a connection to the data resource. A useful abstraction for remote storage such as data bases or access trough the web.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface DBConnector
        Returns:
        true if the connection is successfully instantiated. false otherwise.

      • disconnect

        public boolean disconnect()
        Description copied from interface: DBConnector
        Attempts to close the connection to the data resource. Can also be used for releasing any resources required for the connection.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface DBConnector
        Returns:
        true if the connection is successfully closed. false otherwise

      • registerTrial

        public boolean registerTrial(TrialDefinition trialDefinition)
        Description copied from interface: DBConnector
        Registers the given trial definition object on the data resource. If successful this method should guarantee that DBConnector.trialExists(TrialDefinition) returns true.
        Specified by:
        registerTrial in interface DBConnector
        Parameters:
        trialDefinition - The trial definition to be registered.
        Returns:
        true if the provided TrialDefinition is not present and have been successfully registered. false if the provided TrialDefinition is already registered or the process was unsuccessful.

      • trialExists

        public boolean trialExists(TrialDefinition trialDefinition)
        Specified by:
        trialExists in interface DBConnector
        Parameters:
        trialDefinition - The object whose existence on the data resource to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the TrialDefinition is present in the data source. false otherwise

      • getCount

        public int getCount(TrialDefinition trialDefinition,
           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> args)
        Description copied from interface: DBConnector
        Retrieves the number of participants in a given trial, specified by the TrialDefinition parameter, who the provided response values. attrName.length should be equal to val.length.
        Specified by:
        getCount in interface DBConnector
        Returns:
        number of participants matching

      • getStrategyStatistics

        public Statistics getStrategyStatistics(TrialDefinition trialDefinition)
        Description copied from interface: DBConnector
        Retrieves the StrategyStatistics object for a given TrialDefinition and the number of stratified group. The stratified group number is required as every stratified group have its own statistics.
        Specified by:
        getStrategyStatistics in interface DBConnector
        Parameters:
        trialDefinition - The trial object for which the statics should be returned
        Returns:
        A StrategyStatistics object for the given group.

      • update

        public boolean update(TrialDefinition trialDefinition,
             Participant participant,
             Statistics strategyStatistics,
             int treatment)
        Specified by:
        update in interface DBConnector
        Parameters:
        trialDefinition - The trial object for which the statics should be updated
        participant - The enumeration index of the stratified group within the trial definitions for which the statics should be updated.
        strategyStatistics - The strategy statics which are to be updated on the data base.
        treatment - The treatment allocation arm that the patient have been assigned to.
        Returns:
        A StrategyStatistics object for the given group.

      • registerStrategy

        public boolean registerStrategy(java.lang.String strategy,
                       java.lang.String className)
        Description copied from interface: DBConnector
        Registers a Strategy name to a class name on the data resource. This allows later to be able to retrieve the exact class given a simple name of the Strategy and allow invoking Strategy.allocate(). If successful this method should guarantee that strategyExists(trialDefinition) returns true.
        Specified by:
        registerStrategy in interface DBConnector
        Parameters:
        strategy - The strategy "simple" name which is to be registered.
        className - The strategy full class name to be registered for the given simple name.
        Returns:
        true if the StrategyStatistics is registered successfully. false otherwise

      • strategyExists

        public boolean strategyExists(java.lang.String strategy)
        Specified by:
        strategyExists in interface DBConnector
        Parameters:
        strategy - The strategy "simple" name which is be checked if exists
        Returns:
        true if the StrategyStatistics is already registered false otherwise

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
